Content directives¶

sphinx-revealjs provides features for contents of section.

revealjs_fragments¶

Note

There are cases not working regular.

Inject fragment attribute into objects.

Example¶

.. revealjs_fragments::

    * First
    * Second
    * Third

See demo

Reference¶
